Uses of Package
sage.renderer

  • Packages that use sage.renderer 
    Package Description
    sage.app

    sage.scene.shape  
  • Classes in sage.renderer used by sage.app 
    Class and Description
    IRenderer
    The IRenderer interface defines the set of operations which all "renderers" must implement.
  • Classes in sage.renderer used by sage.camera 
    Class and Description
    IRenderer
    The IRenderer interface defines the set of operations which all "renderers" must implement.
  • Classes in sage.renderer used by sage.display 
    Class and Description
    IRenderer
    The IRenderer interface defines the set of operations which all "renderers" must implement.
  • Classes in sage.renderer used by sage.renderer 
    Class and Description
    IRenderer
    The IRenderer interface defines the set of operations which all "renderers" must implement.
    IRenderer.RENDER_METHOD
    RENDER_METHOD specifies the way in which an IRenderer should utilize the underlying hardware to draw objects.
    RenderContext
    This class holds the states of a rendering context.
  • Classes in sage.renderer used by sage.renderer.jogl 
    Class and Description
    AbstractRenderer
    This class acts as the abstract base class from which all concrete Renderers are derived.
    IRenderer
    The IRenderer interface defines the set of operations which all "renderers" must implement.
    IRenderer.RENDER_METHOD
    RENDER_METHOD specifies the way in which an IRenderer should utilize the underlying hardware to draw objects.
    RenderContext
    This class holds the states of a rendering context.
